content: the candy cane stripes blanket is the perfect addition to your home during the holidays using the c2c method this blanket works up quickly and has a very soft and cozy texture when finished this pattern assumes that you are already familiar with the c2c technique the finished blanket is 48 x 60 supplies 5 0 mm hook 7 skeins paintbox yarns simply aran in pillar red 6 skeins paintbox yarns simply aran in paper white scissors darning needle
